SAINT.Name: Holy Righteous John, Wonderworker of Kronstadt (ROCOR)
Martyr Uaros and with him 7 Monkmartyr Teachers (+c.307)
Transfer of the relics of the Venerable John, Abbot of Rila in Bulgaria (1238)
Blessed Cleopatra and her son John (+327)
Hieromartyr Sadok, Bishop of Persia, and with him 128 Martyrs (+342)
